amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 as en bloc No. 6: Nos. 196, 197, 200, 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 207, 209, 210, 211, 212, 213, 214, 215 ,216, 217, 218, 222, 223, 224, 225, and 227.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wasserman Schultz amendments (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A070) offered by Ms. Wasserman Schultz.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A070) offered by Ms. Wasserman Schultz.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wasserman Schultz amendments (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.
